alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 12:27PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern El Paso County through 100 PM MDT... At 1227 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gleneagle, or 14 miles north of Colorado Springs, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Black Forest around 1235 PM MDT. Falcon and Cimarron Hills around 1240 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
